name: Myrmex
movement: walk, burrow, and climb at 40 feet each
description: The Myrmex is a medium-sized elemental with a strong connection to earth and nature, boasting impressive durability and a physical presence. Its body allows it to maneuver seamlessly through various terrains.
memorable: The Myrmex can manipulate earth and create barriers, influencing its environment dramatically.
goals: To defend its territory and manipulate the battlefield.
relations: Often found in the company of other earth-elementals or nature spirits.
environment: Typically found in rocky terrain or natural settings rich in earth and stone.
strengths: Possesses high durability and resistance to various damage types; can navigate difficult terrain effortlessly.
weaknesses: Low Charisma limits social interactions, making it less engaging.
attacks: Can deliver three powerful Bite attacks that inflict piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Manipulation allows it to shape earth at will, creating obstacles or obstacles.
senses: Has blindsight up to 60 feet, allowing it to sense surroundings in complete darkness.
skills: Possesses good perception, with a +2 modifier to notice surroundings.
additional_information: Elemental Nature means it doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Keen Smell gives it advantage on perception checks reliant on smell.
Limited Telepathy permits communication of simple messages to nearby creatures.
Stone Walk enables movement through difficult rocky terrain without penalty.
Immunity to exhaustion and several conditions increases its survivability.
spellcasting: Can perform Earth Shift and Wall of Earth as spell-like abilities.
test_queries: elemental that walks through stone effortlessly
